description: Gets the readme file or descriptive text for a package version. The returned text might contain formatting. For example, it might contain formatting for Markdown or reStructuredText.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain that contains the repository that contains the package version with the requested readme file.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: The repository that contains the package with the requested readme file.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: A format that specifies the type of the package version with the requested readme file.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the package version with the requested readme file. The package component that specifies its namespace depends on its type. For example: The namespace of a Maven package version is its groupId. The namespace of an npm or Swift package version is its scope. The namespace of a generic package is its namespace. Python, NuGet, Ruby, and Cargo package versions do not contain a corresponding component, package versions of those formats do not have a namespace.

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: The name of the package version that contains the requested readme file.

parameters.name: packageVersion
parameters.description: A string that contains the package version (for example, 3.5.2).

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: The format of the package with the requested readme file.

nested_items.name: namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the package version with the requested readme file. The package component that specifies its namespace depends on its type. For example:
The namespace of a Maven package version is its groupId.
The namespace of an npm or Swift package version is its scope.
The namespace of a generic package is its namespace.
Python, NuGet, Ruby, and Cargo package versions do not contain a corresponding component, package versions of those formats do not have a namespace.

nested_items.name: package
nested_items.description: The name of the package that contains the returned readme file.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the package with the requested readme file.

nested_items.name: versionRevision
nested_items.description: The current revision associated with the package version.

nested_items.name: readme
nested_items.description: The text of the returned readme file.
